stories.text:
I am a high school sophomore interested in security. I built this tool to help people learn how to make strong passwords that are not only hard to guess, but also easy to remember. I built this using Python, Flask, and Bootstrap.

I would love your feedback, if any!
stories.title: Show HN: A tool to make strong passwords that are easy to remember

stories.text:
I'm the owner of a platform that helps founders scale their revenues. SparrowStartup.com/love.

Generally, founders at the same level, face the same ‘foundational’ types of issues with growth.

And so, I’m building out a Slack channel for founders in the $1000 - $5000 MRR range so we can help each other out.

What'll you get:

>> No-BS online resources on growth, marketing, product (e.g., Growth guide).

>> Weekly 30-min mastermind with the members to discuss your journey.

>> Monthly check-in with our vetted advisors as needed. Not linking to avoid coming off spammy.

>> A community to vent on and learn from.

What you're expected to give back:

>> Don't spam. Don't advertise garbage. Be real.

>> Engage 30-mins a week. Participate in conversations you find interesting

Comment here if you’re interested and I’ll invite you. Must be $1000MRR+. Pure SaaS. No exceptions.
stories.title: Ask HN: Do you know SaaS founders $1000 – $5000 MRR?

stories.text:
